name: Nura Tijjani Abubakar
content: Dr Nura Abubakar | Introduction | Brunel University London Skip to Content Home People Dr Nura Abubakar Dr Nura AbubakarAssociate Lecturer (Education) Tel: +44 (0)1895 267851 LinkedIn Computer Science College of Engineering, Design and Physical Sciences Summary Diligent and strategic Software Engineer with 20+ years of experience in the IT industry. Strong background in developing, implementing, and applying information and data system management practices. Shaped through operative and technical roles within various-sized businesses & agencies. Adept at monitoring systems, implementing technological solutions, and improving processes. Academically founded in Management Information Systems. Qualifications Internation Diploma in ICT Advanced Diploma in ICT BSc Computing and Software Engineering MSc Software Engineering PhD Computer Science Responsibility Teaching, Research, Project Supervision, Curriculum, and Volunteering.
